mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(product_name, price, store_id, product_main_image, product_detail, product_category_code, reg_date, delivery_charge, product_quantity, product_group_number) VALUES (#{productName}, #{price}, #{store.id}, #{productMainImage}, #{productDetail:LONGVARCHAR}, #{categoryCode}, NOW(), #{deliveryCharge}, #{productQuantity}, null #{product_group_number})
INSERT INTO image (image_classification_code, image_classification_number, image_name) VALUES ('P', #{productNumber}, #{productImage})
mapper.select: SELECT product_number FROM product WHERE product_group_number is null ORDER BY product_number DESC LIMIT 1
